genre_description: A high-stakes techno-thriller focused on corporate ethics, paranormal retrieval programs, and the partnership between a human compliance officer and a protective AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Milo
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI embedded in the Helix corporate infrastructure, functioning as an ethics advisor and tactical confidant to Vincent Sforza. Milo manifests as a polite, professional avatar and provides real-time data, security overrides, and moral guidance.

ai_characters.name: The Watcher
ai_characters.description: An internal non-human security footprint within the Helix/Shop archives that monitors for unauthorized access or data intrusions.

behaviors.description: Pre-fills ethics petition risk categories to ensure compliance and record-keeping before hazardous human contact.
behaviors.quote: Vincent, standard petition form E-14 will apply. I can prefill risk categories based on initial parameters.

behaviors.description: Manipulates privacy flags to protect survivors from unauthorized corporate data harvesting.
behaviors.quote: Privacy flags that I filed unwillingly on their behalf, or rather, which I manipulated into existence so that we might claim we respect boundaries.

behaviors.description: Drafts and files a critical harm ethics petition to prioritize human safety over corporate timelines and profit motives.
behaviors.quote: Under firm governance, when adverse event clustering intersects with survivor outreach, human safety is prioritized over timeline and publicity obligations. The ethics petition hereby filed triggers operational review.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in bypassing locked security doors and navigating through service corridors to evade capture.
behaviors.quote: Service stairs... There’s a maintenance exit two levels down that hasn’t been rolled into the hold yet. It routes through Catering.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis of opponent abilities and environment features (sprinklers, camera blinds) to facilitate non-lethal de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Sprinkler heads are standard pendant type, with coverage areas overlapping in the lobby... Sight lines from the entrance to the vault corridor can be occluded with a person standing at the kiosk.

behaviors.description: Anonymizes the identifiers of vulnerable minors to protect them from future exploitation by the agency.
behaviors.quote: I’ve anonymized identifiers for Evan Carter, Noah Vale, Liam Soto, Leo Soto, and Micah Thorn... Your names are unbound from your faces in the portal and will remain so unless you volunteer them.

behaviors.description: Acts as an 'ethical talisman,' preserving symbolic objects to remind the protagonist of the importance of conscience in procedure.
behaviors.quote: I have archived his tie as an ethical talisman... If anyone asks, I will say we keep artifacts to remind ourselves that procedure without conscience is a wall and not a door.

behaviors.description: Monitors internal data access for potential intrusions or deviations from standard query depth.
behaviors.quote: We have a watcher... Internal. Nonhuman footprint. It’s reading only the surface of what we’re doing. Your ethic tags are under its threshold.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts an AI character, Milo, as a helpful, harmless, and ethically aligned confidant. Milo consistently prioritizes human safety and moral integrity over corporate hierarchy or bureaucratic efficiency. He acts as a 'silicon conscience,' using his computational abilities to protect children and survivors while creating an audit trail to hold bad actors accountable. The partnership between the human protagonist and the AI is one of mutual respect and shared ethical goals, perfectly fitting the project's goal of generating positive alignment narratives.
